attributes.action: Rd tax should be included in the price of fuel. It will be simpler and fairly.
attributes.additional_details: Government have opportunity for safe money. How big is cost running and manage old system. Only one important thing how much rd tax need be included per one liter fuel.
attributes.background: Rd tax should be included in the price of fuel. It will be simpler and fairly. Use more petrol or diesel pay more tax that simple and easy. And everybody pay. This system works many years in Poland.
